desc: Juniper Networks Secure Access SSL VPN appliances provide a complete range of remote access appliances for the smallest companies up to the largest service providers. As a system administrator or security professional, this comprehensive configuration guide will allow you to configure these appliances to allow remote and mobile access for employees. If you manage and secure a larger enterprise, this book will help you to provide remote and/or extranet access, for employees, partners, and customers from a single platform.

details.authors: Mark Lucas, Brian Burton, Trent Fausett, Patrick Foxhoven, Kevin Peterson, Brad Woodberg, Neil Wyler

title: Juniper Networks Secure Access SSL VPN Configuration Guide
